The Atlantic Current: Mapping the Virgins of Guadalupe and Remedios

Matagorda-El Ejido, Almeria, Andalucia

Katherine Dau

Verified

The town of Matagorda celebrates its patron the Virgin of Guadalupe in the third week of June.
